title: I Can’t Compromise!
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Geez, I don’t care about it anymore....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Come on! You have to think about it a little more!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Forget mine, why don’t you pick your own? I’ve been the only one trying these on.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I’m fine. I can wear anything. But I can’t compromise on yours!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You’re not fine. We all don’t go to the beach that often.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That’s true, but.... I think I’m going to wear a rash guard anyway....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well, I guess it’s better than getting painful sunburns, but if you’re going to care about my swimsuit, you should care about your own too. If you’re not gonna choose, I’m gonna choose for you, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>....That might not be so bad! If you pick one for me, I can keep wearing it to show it off! Hey, Maki-chan, can we just pick one for each other?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I guess it can’t be helped.... I’ll go get one that suits you, Hanayo.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Thank you! Then, Maki-chan, try this one next!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
